column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////First time at Bosscat and they didn't disappoint. We had a girls day brunch with mimosas
column3: and meatloaf hash. Our server Terry made sure to explain the menu in depth and answer any questions we had. Attentive but not too pushy which is what I look for in service coming from the service industry myself. They have a well priced brunch menu and the mimosas were good. Only negative is the music was a little loud so we had to get close on the table to speak to each other
column4: but the Dj was jammin though. Will definitely visit again!
